short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Edit projects, bookmark links, and create notes/highlights while browsing.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Haibrid is solving the problem of collective waste in the data we leave behind when browsing and working online.

Highlight, annotate, and save online content using our extension, 

Organise, edit, and review highlights, notes and sources collected by you and your collaborators.

Produce templated output (articles, blogs, reports) with an integrated LLM that can recall and use team-vetted sources.
